user.description: JRiver Media Server connection information. Please make sure "Use Media Network to share this library and enable DLNA" is enabled in Options > Media Network.

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of the system hosting your JRiver Media Server.

credentials.description: Please enter your JRiver Media Server user name and password. These can be found in Options > Media Network > Authentication

paths.description: Please enter the remote views that you want to be able to browse in Home Assistant. These can be found in the "Customize views for JRemote, Gizmo and Panel" configuration in Options > Media Network > Advanced.

zones.description: Choose whether to expose zones as separate devices.

select_zones.description: Choose which zones to expose as a device

error.no_zones: Must select at least one zone.

add_to_playlist.name: Add to playlist
add_to_playlist.description: Adds library items to the Playing Now playlist. Must provide either a query or a playlist.

query.name: Search Query
query.description: A JRiver search expression as per https://wiki.jriver.com/index.php/Search_Language

playlist_path.name: Playlist Path
playlist_path.description: A path to a playlist to play.

block.name: Controls whether the call is blocking
block.description: true to block, false to return immediately
